definition: color (of one's skin, a sign of good health)/red of cheeks
hematin (blood pigment)/heme/hemoglobin/also written 血紅蛋白|血红蛋白

pinyin: xue4 se4 su4 chen2 ji1 zheng4

sentences.english: His face was drained of color, and he carried a strange, strong-smelling rag in his hand.
sentences.chinese: 他面无血色，手里拿着一块怪味浓重的布头。

sentences.english: Because of this life, her childhood been overshadowed by redness of shadows.
sentences.chinese: 因为这个身世，她的童年被蒙上了血色阴影。

sentences.english: Soup shallow Zhu Shi's cheeks with difficulty appears one silk blood-red color.
sentences.chinese: 汤浅朱实的脸颊好不容易才出现一丝血色。

sentences.english: Over-exposure to NF3via inhalation induces the conversion of hemoglobin to methemoglobin .
sentences.chinese: 过量吸入NF3会导致血色素转化成高铁血红蛋白。

sentences.english: Has good effect to improve skin color, and promote blood circulation with removing blood stasis.
sentences.chinese: 对改善皮肤血色，活血化瘀具有良效。

sentences.english: Your face was whitish in colour, showing no trace of red.
sentences.chinese: 你的脸色很苍白，一点血色也没有。

sentences.english: The content of banana iron is high, can stimulate the hemochrome in the blood.
sentences.chinese: 香蕉铁质含量高，能刺激血液内的血色素。

sentences.english: He paled at the sight of the scary movie.
sentences.chinese: 他看到这部恐怖电影时，吓得面无血色。

sentences.english: His face turns to pale while he was caught to steal in the shop .
sentences.chinese: 当他在商店偷东西被当场抓到时，吓的面无血色。

sentences.english: Sanguineous sky is the first paint of my series about archaian war field.
sentences.chinese: 血色苍茫是古战场系列画作的首篇。

sentences.english: Doris was looking at the floor, her cheeks drained of color, her expression one of utter misery.
sentences.chinese: 桃丽丝望着地板，面无血色，一脸悲凄欲绝的神情。

sentences.english: He was broad and tall, with ghost-pale skin and thinning white hair.
sentences.chinese: 他身板宽大，个子很高，面无血色，一头稀疏的白发。

sentences.english: Hemochromatosis is a disorder of iron metabolism of the body of a genetic disease.
sentences.chinese: 血色病是因组织中铁的沉积过多而发生的全身性疾病。

sentences.english: but my favorite novel by him is "Blood Meridian".
sentences.chinese: 但我最喜欢的小说还是他写的《血色子午线》。

sentences.english: Love is the red of the rose on your coffin door!
sentences.chinese: 爱情是棺材板上玫瑰的血色。

sentences.english: Come to realize, the Bana open, bloody flower, the extradition of the Lost souls.
sentences.chinese: 恍然间，彼岸花开，血色花蕊，引渡着迷惘的游魂。

definition: silvery light/bright white light/shining white light
wisps of blood/visible veins/(of eyes) bloodshot
